target_population: Primarily Black Americans and low-income populations in Alabama, Mississippi, and Louisiana who suffer disproportionately from cardiometabolic diseases.
intervention_approach: A precision public health approach that provides tailored interventions at multiple levels of influence across the care continuum, including prevention, treatment, and management of chronic diseases.
key_objectives: Create intellectual synergy among regional investigators.
Expand the workforce of investigators focused on translational research.
Promote bi-directional collaborations between researchers and community partners.
methodology: Utilizes a multi-level, multi-domain intervention framework that includes rigorous research projects and community engagement to evaluate and implement evidence-based interventions.
alignment_opportunities: Integrate AI for data analysis in chronic disease research.
Leverage real-world data platforms for community health assessments.
strategic_recommendations: Enhance collaboration with local health departments to improve outreach.
Develop training programs for future biomedical scientists focused on chronic disease research.
